mapper.insert: insert into Post(userId, postTitle, postContent, tags) values (#{userId}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{tags})
mapper.update: update Post set postTitle=#{postTitle}, postContent=#{postContent} where postId=#{postId}
mapper.select: select postId, postTitle, userId, postDate, hitNum from Post where postId > 0 order by postId desc, postDate desc
